3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and volume perception; slight perspective distortion at edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. All rooms correctly placed. Minor simplification of the stairs and door swing details.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches 2D plan layout and orientation very accurately across all rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render, no text contamination. Materials are consistent.

detected_errors.description: Staircase geometry simplified compared to the complex layout in the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that preserves nearly all architectural details and furniture placements of the original floor plan.
